TPCE-AC-01.name: Periodic Access Review
TPCE-AC-01.description: Scheduled review of user access rights, privileges, and entitlements to verify continued need and appropriateness

TPCE-AC-02.name: Account Lifecycle Management
TPCE-AC-02.description: End-to-end provisioning, modification, and deprovisioning of user accounts including joiner-mover-leaver workflows

TPCE-AT-01.name: Security Awareness Programme
TPCE-AT-01.description: Ongoing security awareness training including phishing simulation, role-based training, and effectiveness measurement

TPCE-AU-01.name: Audit Log Review and Analysis
TPCE-AU-01.description: Continuous or periodic review of audit logs to detect anomalies, policy violations, and indicators of compromise

TPCE-AU-02.name: Audit Record Lifecycle Management
TPCE-AU-02.description: Retention, archival, protection, and disposal of audit records per regulatory and operational requirements

TPCE-CA-01.name: Security Assessment and Authorization
TPCE-CA-01.description: Periodic assessment of security controls effectiveness, system authorization decisions, and plan of action management

TPCE-CA-02.name: Continuous Monitoring
TPCE-CA-02.description: Ongoing awareness of information security, vulnerabilities, and threats to support risk management decisions

TPCE-CM-01.name: Configuration Baseline Management
TPCE-CM-01.description: Establishment, documentation, and enforcement of approved configuration baselines for information systems

TPCE-CM-02.name: Change Management
TPCE-CM-02.description: Formal process for requesting, evaluating, approving, implementing, and reviewing changes to information systems

TPCE-CP-01.name: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery
TPCE-CP-01.description: Planning, coordination, and execution of business continuity and disaster recovery activities including alternate site operations

TPCE-CP-02.name: Backup and Recovery Testing
TPCE-CP-02.description: Regular testing of backup procedures and recovery capabilities to validate restoration time and data integrity objectives

TPCE-IA-01.name: Credential Lifecycle Management
TPCE-IA-01.description: Issuance, renewal, revocation, and protection of authenticators (passwords, certificates, tokens, keys) across their lifecycle

TPCE-IR-01.name: Incident Detection and Response
TPCE-IR-01.description: End-to-end incident handling from detection through containment, eradication, and recovery, including playbook execution

TPCE-IR-02.name: Incident Communication and Reporting
TPCE-IR-02.description: Timely notification of incidents to relevant stakeholders, authorities, and affected parties per regulatory and contractual obligations

TPCE-MA-01.name: System Maintenance Management
TPCE-MA-01.description: Scheduling, performing, documenting, and reviewing maintenance activities including remote maintenance controls

TPCE-MP-01.name: Media Sanitisation and Disposal
TPCE-MP-01.description: Sanitisation, destruction, and secure disposal of media containing sensitive information prior to reuse or release

TPCE-PE-01.name: Physical Access Control
TPCE-PE-01.description: Management of physical access authorizations, escort procedures, visitor management, and monitoring of physical access to facilities and systems

TPCE-PL-01.name: Security Architecture Review
TPCE-PL-01.description: Periodic review and update of security architecture, system security plans, and design principles to address evolving threats

TPCE-PM-01.name: Security Programme Governance
TPCE-PM-01.description: Strategic direction, oversight, and management of the organisational information security programme including resource allocation and performance reporting

TPCE-PM-02.name: Security Metrics and Reporting
TPCE-PM-02.description: Collection, analysis, and reporting of security performance metrics to support management decisions and demonstrate programme effectiveness

TPCE-PS-01.name: Personnel Screening and Security
TPCE-PS-01.description: Pre-employment screening, ongoing personnel security assessments, and security-related actions for termination and transfer

TPCE-RA-01.name: Risk Assessment and Treatment
TPCE-RA-01.description: Identification, analysis, evaluation, and treatment of information security risks including threat modelling and impact assessment

TPCE-RA-02.name: Vulnerability Management
TPCE-RA-02.description: Continuous identification, prioritisation, remediation, and verification of technical vulnerabilities across the asset inventory

TPCE-SA-01.name: Secure Development Lifecycle
TPCE-SA-01.description: Integration of security activities throughout the software development lifecycle including threat modelling, code review, and security testing

TPCE-SA-02.name: Third-Party Risk Management
TPCE-SA-02.description: Assessment, monitoring, and management of security risks introduced by external service providers, contractors, and supply chain partners

TPCE-SC-01.name: Cryptographic Key Management
TPCE-SC-01.description: Generation, distribution, storage, rotation, revocation, and destruction of cryptographic keys and certificates

TPCE-SC-02.name: Network Architecture Review
TPCE-SC-02.description: Periodic review and validation of network segmentation, boundary protection, and traffic flow controls

TPCE-SI-01.name: Patch Management
TPCE-SI-01.description: Identification, testing, deployment, and verification of security patches and software updates across the system inventory

TPCE-SI-02.name: Malware Defence Management
TPCE-SI-02.description: Deployment, configuration, monitoring, and updating of anti-malware mechanisms including endpoint detection and response capabilities

TPCE-SR-01.name: Supply Chain Risk Assessment
TPCE-SR-01.description: Assessment and monitoring of supply chain risks including component provenance, integrity verification, and supplier security posture evaluation
